Name: Cryptographer
About the game: Cryptographer is a challenging puzzle-platformer that rewards player skill. Make use of bombs, switches, gates, and cannons to clear a path to the escape portal. Be careful with your navigation, however, because the crypt walls collapse as you move. Be precise in your movement to beat the best times. Plan out your actions ahead of time to avoid blocking your path to escape. Play turn-based local multiplayer with your friends. Great for parties! Features Satisfyingly challenging gameplay and puzzles 50 hand-crafted levels Local turn-based multiplayer supporting up to 4 players Beat the gold time on each level to demonstrate your mastery of the game Level selection to retry and replay your favorite levels Full controller support 14 achievements to unlock
